00333 SVG::Text::Text(const string& inString, const Point& inPoint, const Style&  inStyle)
00334 : Primitive("g", inStyle), mText(insertAsLastChild(new Node("text", XML::eData)))
00335 {
00336     setAnchor(inPoint);
00337     mText->setAttribute("transform", Scale(1,-1)+Translate(0,-2*inPoint.y));
00338     mText->insertAsLastChild(new Node(inString, XML::eString));
00339 }
00340 
00341 SVG::Text::Span::Span(const string& inString, const Style& inStyle)
00342 : XML::Node("tspan", inStyle) 
00343 {
00344     insertAsLastChild(new Node(inString, XML::eString));
00345 }
00346 
00347 SVG::Text::Span::Span(const string& inString, const RelPos& inPos, const Style& inStyle)
00348 : XML::Node("tspan", inStyle) 
00349 {
00350     setAttribute("dx", String::convert(inPos.x));
00351     setAttribute("dy", String::convert(inPos.y));
00352     insertAsLastChild(new Node(inString, XML::eString));
00353 }
00354 
00358 void SVG::Text::setAnchor(const Point& inPoint) 
00359 {
00360     mText->setAttribute("x", String::convert(inPoint.x));
00361     mText->setAttribute("y", String::convert(inPoint.y));
00362 }
00363 
00364 SVG::Text& SVG::Text::operator<<(const Span& inSpan)
00365 {
00366     mText->insertAsLastChild(new Node(inSpan));
00367     return *this;
00368 }

00375 inline ostream& operator<<(ostream& outStream, const SVG::Primitive& inPrimitive) 
00376 {
00377     inPrimitive.write(outStream);
00378     return outStream;
